articles.title: Jacqueline Wong makes comeback 4 years after scandal, Sammi Cheng responds - AsiaOne
articles.description: It may be counterintuitive to give well wishes to people who have done wrong to us, but some do it anyway. Four years after her affair with singer Andy Hui, 55, was exposed, Hong Kong actress Jacqueline Wong, 34, is making her return to showbiz with a new mus…
articles.content:

articles.title: Rihanna performed Super Bowl halftime show while pregnant with second child, representative confirms - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Rihanna wore a puffy, bright red jumpsuit with tight, rubbery garb underneath that showed a baby bump that fuelled a wave of social media speculation until the big revelation.
